li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Bowman</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is naturally good at shooting things from afar. [PAWN_pronoun] can fight in close combat, but would prefer not to.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Swordsman</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is handy with a sword. [PAWN_pronoun] has some skills with a bow, but prefers to fight up close and personal.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Builder</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skilled builder. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to build all sorts of buildings and furnitures.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Miner</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spends a lot of time examining rocks. [PAWN_pronoun] is rather good at spotting valuable minerals.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Kitchenhand</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to watch others cook.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Butcher</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to chop meat into chunks, preferably animal meat...

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Farmer</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to watch things grow.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Herder</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to raise animals and be in their presence.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Smith</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes the sound the forge makes. Ding! Ding! Ding!

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Tailor</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] thinks it would be nice if everyone could just stop running around with no clothes on.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Artist</color>
li.description: Maybe it's art, or maybe [PAWN_nameDef] tripped over a bucket of paint. Again.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Physician</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came to the realisation one day that [PAWN_pronoun] could stare at naked bodies with a valid excuse.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Trader</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a good negotiator, so good that he starts to make money off it.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Scholar</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a thirst for knowledge.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Groundskeeper</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spends [PAWN_possessive] time keeping everything neat and tidy.

li.label: <color=#00ff00>Talent: Copycat</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't particularly good at anything, except at what everyone else does.

li.label: <color=#1f75fe>Talent: Weapons Master</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is excellent at wielding all weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] could even kill using [PAWN_possessive] little finger.

li.label: <color=#1f75fe>Talent: Hunter</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is skilled at interacting with and hunting animals. Although not trained for battle, [PAWN_pronoun] could put up a good fight if needed.

li.label: <color=#1f75fe>Talent: Engineer</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert at building things. Very few construction works are a challenge to [PAWN_pronoun].

li.label: <color=#1f75fe>Talent: Cook</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves making food. Mmmmm...

li.label: <color=#1f75fe>Talent: Herbalist</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a wide range of botanical knowledge and decent medical skills.

li.label: <color=#1f75fe>Talent: Armourer</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] considers it a sacred duty to produce the highest quality weapons and apparels possible to contribute to the defense of [PAWN_possessive] homeland.

li.label: <color=#7f00ff>Talent: Adventurer</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skilled fighter. [PAWN_pronoun] realised that [PAWN_pronoun] could protect [PAWN_possessive] friends and satisfy [PAWN_possessive] curiosity at the same time.

li.label: <color=#7f00ff>Talent: Architect</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an architect. [PAWN_pronoun] understands that you don't have to be in The Good Place to build The Good Place.

li.label: <color=#7f00ff>Talent: Chef</color>
li.description: Cooking is an art, or so [PAWN_nameDef] says.

li.label: <color=#7f00ff>Talent: Surgeon</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] took it one step further, realising that [PAWN_pronoun] could get paid touching people's naked bodies.

li.label: <color=#7f00ff>Talent: Philosopher</color>
li.description: Everyone hates moral philosophy professors, but [PAWN_nameDef] certainly isn't one.

li.label: <color=#d4af37>Talent: Scout</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert at scouting out new locations. [PAWN_pronoun] frequently leave the relative safety of the colony to patrol the wilderness.

li.label: <color=#d4af37>Talent: Recruiter</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very pursuasive. [PAWN_pronoun] finds it relatively easy to rally people under [PAWN_pronoun] banner.

li.label: <color=#d4af37>Talent: Jack-of-all-trades</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't really standout, and [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't find anything particularly difficult.

li.label: <color=#e0115f>Talent: Hero</color>
li.description: As long as [PAWN_nameDef] still draws breath, isn't one threat the the colony couldn't overcome!

li.label: <color=#ff6fff>No Talent</color>
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has no talent. None whatsoever
